page_title: International Scholarships | International | Te Herenga Waka—Victoria University of Wellington

content.text: This scholarship is for all new international students who are entering their first year of a Bachelor's degree programme and studying full-time on campus.
This scholarship is for all new international students who are entering a Master's degree or Postgraduate Diploma and studying full-time on campus.
Students from eligible countries can apply for fully funded study at Victoria University of Wellington through the Manaaki New Zealand Scholarships programme.

sections.header: Scholarships for high school students in New Zealand

content.text: International students studying at a high school in New Zealand may be eligible for some specific school-leaver scholarships as well.
Find out which scholarships may suit you
If you are studying a doctorate or a Master’s at our university, you may be eligible for some other scholarships.
Find out which scholarships may suit you

sections.header: Explore all scholarships for international students

content.text: Use our scholarships database to find other scholarships you may be eligible for as an international student.

The VUW Undergraduate International Scholarship and the VUW Postgraduate International Scholarship were established in August 2025, replacing and combining some of our previous scholarships such as the Tongarewa International Scholarship, the Latin American Academic Achievement Scholarship, the International Alumni Fees Waiver, and the New Zealand International School-Leaver Grant.

Find out what to do if you've received a prior offer of place, if you're an existing international student, or if you have already received any of the past scholarships. This page explains what’s changed and your next steps.
Next steps for our international students
